document_data.name: Waihun Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Waihun Road''' was a road in the [[Telflamm#Shou Town|Shou Town]] of [[Telflamm]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. In {{yearlink|1375}}, [[Raidon Kane]] ran from some pursuers heading north from his home using this road; on his path north, he reached the gate of the Shou Town.{{cite book/Stardeep|40-41|4}}
